content.description: Ski boots are all about transfer of power - yours to your skis - and the Atomic Hawx Ultra 110 S GW Ski Boots are all about that. If you've got a narrow foot and ankle and have been floating around in roomy, "average fit" ski boots for years, a couple runs in the Ultra 110 S will produce at least several "aha" moments. The 110 flex is ideal for advanced skiers with slim builds as well as those who spend most of their time exploring off-piste and searching for softer snow. As expected, Atomic's Memory Fit heat molding process does wonders to iron the kinks out of the bootfitting process, as well as widening the boot in the forefoot and midfoot where needed, and the new Mimic Gold liner is the best stock moldable liner to date.
content.name: Atomic Hawx Ultra 110 S GW Ski Boots 2023
